channel.title: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More
channel.description:
![33a60b9dfc3c0b0fd975c7b3c44fa3d0|392x500](upload://1bcYhVlb3m0bYRATlhRLeO6psWi.jpeg) **The Gauntleteer is Missing! A Gauntlet Comics Summer Crossover.**
The Gauntleteer has taken many forms throughout the history of New Gauntlet City, but always they are a beacon of hope and an anchor of stability. Suddenly, the Gauntleteer is missing... and only you heroes even remember they existed! Can you save an aspect of the Gauntleteer and restore balance to your era?
________
Once you were homefront heroes, proud members of the Greatest Generation as New Gauntlet City did its bit during WWII. But when the Gauntleteer went missing, everything changed. Supers are now regarded with suspicion across the board, and you find yourself tarred as a fifth columnist! What’s worse, the citizens of New Gauntlet City don’t even seem to remember the Gauntleteer! Can you, a team of young supers, unravel this disappearance and clear your names?
We'll be playing five sessions of Masks set in the Golden Age on Monday evenings (7pm-10pm Eastern time) in June.
Sessions will run three hours. They will be recorded and posted on YouTube (if all players agree). Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. One slot is reserved for Brian Lagoda, who’ll be playing my homebrew playbook The Conduit.
Characters, settings, and situations from prior Gauntlet Comics series may appear, and any player is free to use a PC they've played before, flesh out an existing support character to play, or create a new hero from scratch. Thanks to the Gauntlet Comics summer crossover event, our story will be part of the big picture that emerges from other games in June!
Aiming for a story of superheroic actions and teen feels, rated PG-13. The X-Card, Open Door Policy, and Lines and Veils will be in use. This event abides by the [Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
[date=2020-06-01 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-06-01 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session One](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M40Be0ZSQTmYU6moAO0)
[date=2020-06-08 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-06-08 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session Two](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M40BsGcCJyvZlawILoA)
[date=2020-06-15 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-06-15 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session Three](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M40C4CwzLgywtoqGJZt)
[date=2020-06-22 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-06-22 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session Four](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M40CEvYQbf6uYBjPgmG)
[date=2020-06-29 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-06-29 time=22:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] [Session Five](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M40CT3OGT-SZvcxiqLh)

item.title: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More (Session 5/5)
Starring: @stevendj, Leah S, Dan B, and Brian L
In the grand finale, our young heroes fight to reclaim the Gauntlet and restore the Gauntleteer. Raggedy Jan levels up her illusions, Phantom Pain channels herself from multiple universes, Blitz lets fall the mask, and Red Robe discovers new complications with his phenomenal cosmic powers.

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More

item.title: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More (Session 4/5)
Starring: @stevendj, Leah S, Dan B, and Brian L
Our team of heroes battles Johnny Earthquake, a host of underground mushroom men, and the fires of time itself to rescue the Gauntleteer! Raggedy Jan taps into her intrepid reporter side, Phantom Pain trades places with her alternate universe counterpart, Blitz forms an unexpected connection, and Red Robe tastes a moment of transcendent power.

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More

item.title: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More (Session 3/5)
Starring: @stevendj, Leah S, Dan B, and Brian L
Our heroes escape from a fight at a Solomon Industries facility with a strange sphere that may contain the Gauntleteer—but also the fiery entropy of time itself! Raggedy Jan hotwires a van that will take the team much farther than expected. Phantom Pain gazes into the abyss. Blitz unmasks to a teammate for the first time. And Red Robe discovers just how much collateral damage his powers can cause.

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More

item.title: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More (Session 2/5)
Starring: @stevendj, Leah S., Dan B, Brian L, @Daniel_Scholler

The Gauntleteer is Missing! A Gauntlet Comics Summer Crossover.

A new hero enters the fray as we meet the super-strong amnesiac Brawl! The team do some digging and end up breaking into a new Solomon Industries facility in search of answers about the missing Gauntleteer. Raggedy Jan puts on her dogged reporter cap, Phantom Pain pieces together a troubling picture of the future, Blitz electrifies more than she means to, and Red Robe taps into strange new magic abilities.

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More

item.title: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More (Session 1/5)
Starring: @stevendj, Leah S, Dan B, and Brian L

A young team of super heroes on the WWII homefront battle the Electric Marquis and then start putting the pieces together about the Gauntleteer’s sinister disappearance. In this session, we meet our team and start our adventure. Introducing: Raggedy Jan the muckraking Delinquent, Phantom Pain the ghost-channeling Harbinger, Blitz the electrically-charged Janus, and Red Robe the magically-empowered Conduit.

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics SUMMER CROSSOVER—Masks: Golden No More
